issue.title: Set up arrow-dist git repo
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1189](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1189). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In this repository we can put build tooling for

- Python wheels
- conda packages
- .deb and .rpm Linux packages

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1189?focusedCommentId=16077827) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Repo exists, content is missing: https://github.com/apache/arrow-dist

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1189?focusedCommentId=16078300) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Got it, I changed the JIRA title to instead cover moving our existing build scripts there

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1189?focusedCommentId=16090070) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Sames as for the related issue, we need to wait for infra set some things up until then we should release 0.5.0 with the current repositories.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1189?focusedCommentId=16106219) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Closing in favor of ARROW-1262
